content.html: Everyone knows I am not an asshole. I'm just a guy curious about software. I am shadowbanned everywhere, and being nasty is the only way to get beyond the filters. Ask security people about it, its dumb. Sorry, I don't like it either, but please don't take it personally.
content.value:
Everyone knows I am not an asshole. I'm just a guy curious about software.

I am shadowbanned everywhere, and being nasty is the only way to get beyond the filters.

Ask security people about it, its dumb.

Sorry, I don't like it either, but please don't take it personally.
